dataList.name: Silenzio
dataList.desc:
Quando subisce un colpo da un'attacco, ottiene 3 [Binding] il turno successivo, ed infligge +20% danni quando attacco con un tipo o Affinità a cui il bersaglio ha resistenza Debole o Fatale.
(Una volta per turno.)

dataList.name: Brace
dataList.desc:
Quando vince uno Scontro, infligge [Combustion] pari a (Rison-A Ira / 2).
(Una volta per Abilità.)

dataList.name: Dol Hareubang
dataList.desc: All'inizio del turno, ottiene 3 [HitTakeDamageDown] e [AmberTakeDamageDown].

dataList.name: Ennui
dataList.desc: Se un nemico Vacilla durante l'attacco du quest'unità, 1 alleato con i PS più bassi ottiene +2 [MentalSystemResultIncrease_Typo] il turno successivo. (Max 3 volte per turno)

dataList.name: Velo Liquido
dataList.desc: All'inizio del turno, applica 2 [Protection] all'alleato con i PV minori. (Inclusa quest'unità)

dataList.name: Fa Male!
dataList.desc: Infligge +10% danni per ogni effetto negativo su quest'unità. (Max 50%)

dataList.name: Passione Smoderata
dataList.desc: Sul Colpo, se il bersaglio ha [Laceration], si cura di 3 PV

dataList.name: Ondata di Depressione
dataList.desc:
Il bersaglio dell'Abilità più a sinistra sul Pannello di Controllo perde PS pari a (2x Rison-A Tristezza) dopo l'attacco.
(I bersagli senza PS subiscono invece danno da Tristezza.)

dataList.name: Arte
dataList.desc: Infligge e subisce +5% danni per ogni nemico che quest'unità ha sconfitto nel turno precedente.

dataList.name: Fiamma del Quarto Fiammifero
dataList.desc: Ogni quarta Abilità usata ottiene +4 Valore Finale ed infligge 4 [Combustion] con ognuno dei suoi attacchi.

dataList.name: Rifiuto di Giudicare
dataList.desc: All'inizio della fase di combattimento, se viene bersagliato da 3 o più Abilità, ottiene 3 [Protection].

dataList.name: Final Augment
dataList.desc: If the E.G.O Skill <Screwloose Wallop> is used at less than 25% PV, gain 3 Attack Power Up, Defense Power Up, and Haste every turn, but then die in 3 turns.

dataList.name: Revelation from Above
dataList.desc: After winning a clash with the leftmost skill on the Dashboard, apply 1 Attack Power Up or Defense Power Up to a random ally next turn.

dataList.name: Ripple
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, heal PS for the ally with the least PS by the count of your highest A-Reson. value, excluding those in Panic.

dataList.name: Binding Ribbons
dataList.desc: The target of the leftmost skill on the Dashboard is inflicted with (Lust A-Reson. / 4) Lust Fragility next turn.

dataList.name: Vying Spirit
dataList.desc: When another ally defeats an enemy, gain 1 Attack Power Up and 1 Haste at the start of next turn. (Max 3)

dataList.name: Roar
dataList.desc:
After defeating an enemy, gain Charge Count by half that turn's Envy A-Reson.
(Envy A-Reson. / 2)

dataList.name: Compulsion
dataList.desc:
Clash Power +2 in clashes whose win rate is in the unit's favor.
Clash Power -2 in clashes whose win rate is against the unit's favor.

dataList.name: Pink Ribbons
dataList.desc: On clash win, inflict 1 Pink Ribbons

dataList.name: Shower of Fire
dataList.desc: On hit, if target had [Combustion], inflict 1 Burn on 3 random enemies.

dataList.name: Severance
dataList.desc: +1 PS Heal Efficiency, -1 PS Loss Efficiency

dataList.name: Spark of Flame
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy that has [Combustion], heal PV by (Wrath A-Reson.)% of Max PV.

dataList.name: Coldness
dataList.desc:
On hit, if target has 5+ Sinking, inflict 1 Bind and Attack Power Down.
(3 times per unit)

dataList.name: Unstable
dataList.desc: If a skill's Coin hits with a different side from the previous Coin in the same skill, lose 5 PS and gain 1 Damage Up this turn. (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Live Offering
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy with an attack or counter skill, gain 5 E.G.O resources of that skill's Affinity.

dataList.name: Tactical Perfection
dataList.desc: If the unit did not get hit at all during a turn, gain 1 Damage Up next turn. (Max 3 stacks)

dataList.name: Stem of Distrust
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 Pierce DMG Up.
On hit with a Heads coin, inflict 1 Bind and +1 Rupture Count next turn.

dataList.name: Emptying
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 Lust DMG Up.
Gain 1 more when below 0 PS.

dataList.name: Uncontrolled Morph
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if below 25% PV, heal 15 PV and gain 2 Protection.
When this effect activates, inflict 1 random other ally & 1 random enemy with +2 PS Loss Efficiency.

dataList.name: Maggots
dataList.desc: On hit, inflict 5 Maggots at a (Gluttony A-Reson. x8)% chance.

dataList.name: Nutrient Absorption
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy that has Rupture, heal PV by (Gluttony A-Reson.)% of Max PV.

dataList.name: Haphazard Discharge
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, a random ally with [Charge] gains +(Envy A-Reson. / 2) Charge Count.

dataList.name: Adaptive Release
dataList.desc:
While this unit has [Charge], deal +2% damage per Charge Count.
Skills spend -2 Charge Count.

dataList.name: Cauldron of Gorging
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, convert 2 random non-Lust E.G.O resources into 1 Lust resource.

dataList.name: Stew Spewage
dataList.desc: Tails Coins inflict 1 Burn if hitting an enemy.

dataList.name: Rambling Man
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if this unit took no damage last turn, gain +4 Charge Count.
After successfully hitting an enemy with lower Speed, inflict +1 Rupture Count. (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Entangled Phenomena Restoration
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with negative status effects, this unit gains +1 Charge Count. 
(Max +4 per turn.)
When PV falls to 0 for the first time during battle, spend all Charge Count and heal in proportion to the amount spent. (Cannot heal over 25% Max PV.)

dataList.name: Untempered Agitation
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, if targeted by 2 or more skills, this unit's skills have +1 Base Power; when hit, inflict 1 Burn on the attacker. (5 times per turn.)

dataList.name: Slaying Amid Cheers
dataList.desc: When attacking a target with less than 30% PV, Wrath skills deal +20% damage.

dataList.name: Breath of the Hunt
dataList.desc:
After a clash, gain 2 Poise
When staggered, gain 2 Protection; when recovering from stagger, gain 5 Poise

dataList.name: Temperamental Discharge
dataList.desc:
When hit, spend 1 Charge Count to heal 2.5% of Max PV
At less than 40% PV, gain 1 Charge Count before activating the healing effect. (Can gain up to 10 Charge Count per turn)

dataList.name: Alternating Discharge
dataList.desc: On hit with a Heads coin, spend 2 Charge Count to give +1 Charge Count to the Charge-possessing ally with the lowest Charge Count

dataList.name: Ray of Sun After Rain
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, all allies heal 3 PS

dataList.name: Spider's Webs
dataList.desc: On clash win, inflict 1 Bind next turn. (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Predator
dataList.desc: If this unit healed more than 10% of its Max PV this turn, gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn.

dataList.name: Opened Can
dataList.desc: On hit, if target has 5+ [Sinking], inflict 1 Defense Power Down. (5 times per turn)

dataList.name: Seagull Squawking Of The Distant Seas
dataList.desc:
When an enemy is defeated, the ally with the least PS heals 1 PS.
Whenever an enemy is defeated, the amount of PS healed increases by 2. (Max 9)
The amount is reset at the start of a new wave.

dataList.name: Fairy Lure
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy that mainly targets this unit at the start of the combat phase, heal (3 + (Gluttony A-Reson.))% PV

dataList.name: Dhyāna
dataList.desc:
Raise Max PV by 15% of this Identity's base Max PV when recovering from Staggered state.
Then, heal by 15% of current Max PV. If at less than 30% of current Max PV, heal by 25% instead.
(3 times per encounter. At Encounter End, revert to base Max PV. Current PV value will be adjusted to reflect the PV percentage at the time of Encounter End.)

dataList.name: Bound Wrath
dataList.desc:
This unit's leftmost skill on the Dashboard loses 1 Base Power and gains 2 Coin Power
At the start of the turn, if at 4- Speed, gain 1 Blunt Power Up

dataList.name: Flamebrand
dataList.desc: On Heads Hit with a Lust affinity Skill, inflict 1 Burn on target (6 times per turn)

dataList.name: Green Slime
dataList.desc: If struck at less than 50% PV, inflict 1 Rupture on the attacker. (Activates (Highest Gluttony A-Reson) times per turn)

dataList.name: Dream Devouring
dataList.desc: On Crit with a Pride affinity Skill, gain 1 Poise Count (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Temeritous Voyage
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, inflict 5 Sinking to 1 other ally with the lowest PV; Apply 1 Haste and 3 Offense Level Up next turn

dataList.name: Sticky Filth
dataList.desc: On Heads Hit with a Pierce Skill, inflict 1 Bind (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Prophecy of Ruin
dataList.desc:
On Heads Hit with a Lust affinity Skill, lower this unit and the target's PS by 4.
(Does not work against targets without Sanity)
Gain 5 Lust E.G.O resources On Kill with a Lust affinity Skill

dataList.name: Sentencing from Above
dataList.desc: Whenever an enemy is Staggered, the ally with the least PV percentage heals 4% of their Max PV. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Infinite Hatred
dataList.desc:
When this unit has a status effect or a negative effect, and if the main target or the attacker has a positive effect:
- Inflict +1 more Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, and Sinking Potency to self and enemies with Skill effects or Coin effects
- Gain +1 more Poise and Charge Count with Skill effects or Coin effects

dataList.name: Fair Presents
dataList.desc:
When applying positive effects to other allies with Skill effects or Coin effects, randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking.
Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect to 1 random enemy. (Activates 5 times per Turn. Can be applied up to 5 times per enemy. For abnormalities, applied to a random Part.)

dataList.name: Fallen Stone Pagoda
dataList.desc: Gain 2 Poise and +2 Poise Count when defeating an enemy with [Laceration] (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Crown of Roses
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Inflict 2 Rupture Potency on a random enemy(Negli Incontri Mirati, all parts)
When activating Absolute Resonance, inflict 2 Rupture Potency on all enemies at Combat Start

dataList.name: If I Could Go Back...
dataList.desc:
After Attack: If the target is defeated after this unit's attack, gain 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource.
Gain 1 additional E.G.O resource for every 5 ([Sinking] Potency + Count) (max 3)
(If there are 2 or more "least-owned E.G.O resource", select 1 of those Affinities at random to gain an E.G.O resource)

dataList.name: Fractured Yesterday
dataList.desc:
If the target has 6+ [Sinking] Potency, Clash Power +1
If the target has 4+ [Sinking] Count, Clash Power +1

dataList.name: Tempestuous Screaming
dataList.desc: If the target is defeated at this unit's Slash or Envy Affinity Skill End, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Overloading Cables
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: At 4+ Reson., gain 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp].
If the Reson. was an Envy Reson., apply the above effects to the 2 units adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard as well

dataList.name: Chains of Binding
dataList.desc:
- Combat Start: At 4+ highest Reson. that includes this unit's Skills, apply 3 [AttackUp] and 3 [DefenseUp] to self and all allies who were a part of that Reson.
- If the said Reson. was an A-Reson., apply 2 additional [AttackUp] and [DefenseUp]

dataList.name: Grand Welcome
dataList.desc: After Attack from this unit: if target is Staggered or defeated, gain +1 Pride E.G.O resource and +1 E.G.O resource for 1 other random Affinity (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Gluttony
dataList.desc:
If the main target took PV damage this turn and isn't at max PV at Skill Use:
On Hit,
- When this unit is at max PV, deal +5~+10% damage.
- When this unit isn't at max PV, heal 2~5 PV. 
(7 times per turn)
dataList.summary: If the target isn't at max PV, deal more damage On Hit or heal PV On Hit

dataList.name: Obsession
dataList.desc: This unit's leftmost Skill on the Dashboard inflicts double the [Laceration] Potency (once per turn)

dataList.name: Gloominess
dataList.desc: When this unit uses a Skill to trigger [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, inflict 1 [AttackDown] and 2 [DefenseDown] on the enemy next turn. (3 times per turn, including E.G.O Skills)
dataList.summary: When triggering [VibrationExplosion], inflict 1 [AttackDown] and 2 [DefenseDown] next turn

dataList.name: Tear Film
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: If this unit has Shield, gain 1 [Protection]
If this unit is under [ShieldManagerCryingToad]'s effect, gain 1 additional [Protection]
dataList.summary:
If this unit has Shield, gain 1 [Protection]
If [ShieldManagerCryingToad] is active, gain 1 [Protection]

dataList.name: Running Time
dataList.desc: When this unit uses a Skill to trigger [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, gain 1 [Agility] next turn. (4 times per turn, including E.G.O Skills)
dataList.summary: When using a Skill to trigger [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, gain 1 [Agility] next turn. (4 times per turn, including E.G.O Skills)

dataList.name: Mark of the Gaze
dataList.desc: Whenever this unit uses a base Attack Skill against an enemy, gain 1 additional E.G.O resource for a random, least-owned Affinity that doesn't correspond to the Affinity of the Attack Skill used (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Crushed Pendant
dataList.desc: Combat Start: At 3+ highest Reson., gain 3 [Breath].

dataList.name: Rambling Man
dataList.desc:
Max [Charge] Count +5
Skills that consume [Charge] Count deal +2% damage for every ([Charge] - 1) (max 10%)
dataList.summary: Skills that consume [Charge] Count deal more damage

dataList.name: Lament
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if this unit has a negative effect, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn
When attacking targets that are either in Panic or in E.G.O Corrosion: deal +15% damage

dataList.name: Interloper Reception
dataList.desc:
If the target has [UninvitedGuestPersonality] or any of the Panic Type changing effects, Clash Power +1.
On Hit against the said target, heal 1 ally with the least PS for 5 PS. (once per turn)

dataList.name: Sprawling Lasso
dataList.desc: After Attack, if target is Staggered or defeated, inflict +1 [Burst] Count against 2 random enemies (once per turn; cannot stack; negli Incontri Mirati, against 2 random Parts)
dataList.summary: After Attack, if target is Staggered or defeated, inflict +1 [Burst] Count against 2 random enemies

dataList.name: Time to Hunt
dataList.desc: If an enemy or an ally is killed due to [Burst] or [Laceration] damage, inflict 2 [Snare] against a random enemy, and gain 1 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Spiring Crimson Blossom
dataList.desc: Every time 10+ [Laceration] damage occurs, heal 1 PS on self (10 per turn)

dataList.name: Iron Stake against the Heart
dataList.desc:
When inflicting [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed' against an enemy with Base Attack Skills, inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (once per turn)
- If the target has [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed', inflict additional 2 [Laceration] (once per turn)

If an ally, including this unit, takes direct PV damage from the enemy, inflict 1 [Curse] against the target enemy (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Grimy Hide
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: if this unit has a negative effect, gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] and 1 [Endurance]
- Gain 1 [Protection] for every 3 negative effect on self (max 2)

dataList.name: Bloodthirsty Banquet
dataList.desc:
When this unit deals or takes [Laceration] damage, heal PV equal to the [Laceration] damage (max 10 per turn)
- When activating a Skill/Coin effect that inflicts [Laceration], if target has [RoseWedge], inflict 1 [Laceration] against the target. (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Next
dataList.desc: After Attack: if target is killed, gain +2 [Breath] Count (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Broken Bell
dataList.desc:
Inflict [Vulnerable] this turn on enemies who were hit by [VibrationExplosion] from Skill, Coin, or Passive effects.
- Does not stack with E.G.O Gifts that inflict [Vulnerable] upon triggering Tremor Burst. (If the said E.G.O Gifts have been enhanced, subtract this effect's value from the final value before inflicting it.)

dataList.name: A Gaze in the Shadows
dataList.desc:
Allies gain +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill or Coin effects (2 times per turn)
- If the ally's target is in Staggered, Morale Basso, or Panic states, gain +2 more instead
- Effect does not stack with E.G.O Gifts of an identical effect.

dataList.name: Insomniac Night
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: against all enemies, inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] to all enemies (# of enemies in Staggered, Morale Basso, or Panic states) times. (2 times per turn)
- Effect does not stack with E.G.O Gifts with the same effect.

dataList.name: Seven Bullets
dataList.desc:
- On Hit with Base Attack Skills: inflict ([FreischutzShotCount] / 3) [Combustion] (3 times per turn)
- For Lobotomy E.G.O::Magic Bulle​t Outis Identity, inflict ([FreischutzShotCount]) [Combustion] instead (3 times per turn)
- If the target has 30+ [Combustion], inflict 1 [DarkFlame] instead of the above effect (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Breath
dataList.desc:
Next Turn Start after using this E.G.O Skill: gain 1 [NebulizerInhale] (once per turn)
- If this Skill defeated enemies, gain additional [NebulizerInhale] equal to the number of targets defeated
- If this Skill defeated allies, gain (targets defeated x 2) additional [NebulizerInhale]
- This value Stacks over this Encounter's duration

dataList.name: Breath
dataList.desc:
Next Turn Start after using this E.G.O Skill: gain 1 [NebulizerExhale] (once per turn)
- This value Stacks throughout the Encounter

Combat Start: gain 1 [NebulizerExhale] every time this unit applies 10 [Breath] Count to allies with [NebulizerExhale] effects

Turn End: starting from allies with the lowest PV percentages, heal ([NebulizerExhale] Stack)% PV for (highest Reson.) allies (max 6)
- If the unit receiving healing has 20+ [Breath] Potency, activate healing 1 more time

dataList.name: Blazing Amusement
dataList.desc:
When a target with 10+ [Combustion] Count is defeated, inflict the [Combustion] Count on target between all enemies and heal PS 8 on self (negli Incontri Mirati, between all Parts; 3 max per target, 2 times per turn)
- At max PS, heal 5 PS for 1 ally with the least PS instead

dataList.name: Enfeebling Talisman
dataList.desc:
On Hit with this unit's Skills: if the target either has 15+ [Burst], or if this unit dealt a Critical Hit, inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (max 6)
- When this Passive activates, its effects do not stack with the effects of E.G.O Gift "Old Wooden Doll".

dataList.name: Reversal Death by Gu Poison
dataList.desc:
Whenever this unit inflicts [Sinking] Potency, [Sinking] Count, or 'Unique Sinking' using its Attack Skills, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (max 2)
- At 3+ A-Reson., with the same conditionals, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn instead (max 3)

dataList.name: Crying Tears
dataList.desc:
If the target is defeated after this unit's Attack or Counter Skills:
- Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
- To all allies, including this unit: next turn, apply 1 DMG Up to the Damage Type & Affinity of the Skill used to activate this effect (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)

When this unit dies:
- Apply 1 [ShamrockDamageUp] and [PenetrateDamageUp] to all allies next turn (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Crying Tears
dataList.desc:
- Turn End: If this unit had a negative effect or lost its PV or PS, heal 5 PS.
- If this unit or an ally is defeated, inflict 1 [Vulnerable] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Arcana Aptitude Circuit
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count
- If this unit already gains [Charge] by consuming [Charge] Count on self, this effect does not stack with that effect
- This unit's Base Attack Skills that consume [Charge] Count: deal +5% damage for every [Charge] on self (max 25%)

If this unit is a Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 additional Skill 3 use

dataList.name: Metronome
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: in odd-numbered turns, gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]; in even-numbered turns, gain 1 [Protection]
- Does not stack with the Metronome E.G.O Gift. (If the said E.G.O Gift is at an enhanced state, its effect subtracts the values gained from this effect)
- Does not affect the instances of its effect applied to other allies

When using E.G.O Skill, gain 1 [AccumulatedPastSinner] next turn (once per Encounter)
- Gain 1 [AccumulatedPastSinner] at every subsequent Turn End
